metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3071 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 25.0.0.148 and earlier have an exploitable useafter free vulnerability when masking display objects. Successfulexploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3071` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 25.0.0.171ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 25.0.0.171ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '25.0.0.171ubuntu0.16.04.1').
